suggest.php-64bit: For support of more than 30 languages, a 64bit php installation on all involved prod/dev machines is required
suggest.ext-curl: Curl provides better support for interacting with other servers, like downloading packages over SSL
suggest.ext-gd: Unless you have ImageMagic installed GD is required for eZ Publish to be able to manipulate images
suggest.ext-mysqli: Mysqli is the default database handler used by eZ Publish
suggest.ext-pcntl: If you plan to take advantage of eZ Publish Async publishing feature, then pcntl extension is required

suggest.php-64bit: For support of more than 30 languages, a 64bit php installation on all involved prod/dev machines is required
suggest.ext-curl: Curl provides better support for interacting with other servers, like downloading packages over SSL

suggest.ext-mysqli: Mysqli is the default database handler used by eZ Publish
suggest.ext-pcntl: If you plan to take advantage of eZ Publish Async publishing feature, then pcntl extension is required
suggest.ezsystems\/ezsi-ls: ezsi would allow you to use Edge/Server Side Includes of blocks in templates
suggest.ezsystems\/ezscriptmonitor-ls: ezscriptmonitor makes it possible to better deal with long running bulk operations within eZ Publish
suggest.ezsystems\/ezfind-ls: ezfind is a Solr based advance search engine for eZ Publish with a lot more features then the built in search
suggest.ezsystems\/eztags-ls: eztags is a full tagging/taxonomy solution for eZ Publish replacing the simpler builtin ezkeywords datatype

1.0.name: jeromegamez/ezpublish-modern-legacy
1.0.description: A drop in replacement for modern eZ Publish Legacy (4.x) projects.

suggest.php-64bit: For support of more than 30 languages, a 64bit php installation on all involved prod/dev machines is required
suggest.ext-curl: Curl provides better support for interacting with other servers, like downloading packages over SSL
suggest.ext-gd: Unless you have ImageMagic installed GD is required for eZ Publish to be able to manipulate images
suggest.ext-mysqli: Mysqli is the default database handler used by eZ Publish
suggest.ext-pcntl: If you plan to take advantage of eZ Publish Async publishing feature, then pcntl extension is required
suggest.ezsystems\/ezsi-ls: ezsi would allow you to use Edge/Server Side Includes of blocks in templates
suggest.ezsystems\/ezscriptmonitor-ls: ezscriptmonitor makes it possible to better deal with long running bulk operations within eZ Publish
suggest.ezsystems\/ezfind-ls: ezfind is a Solr based advance search engine for eZ Publish with a lot more features then the built in search
suggest.ezsystems\/eztags-ls: eztags is a full tagging/taxonomy solution for eZ Publish replacing the simpler builtin ezkeywords datatype
